== Main Inclusion Report for libxml-perl ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libx/libxml-perl (Arch: `all`)
# ''Rationale:''
** Dependency of main package `libxml-grove-perl`, which is needed for `libnet-dbus-perl`, which is needed for `system-tool-backends`
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Just a perl library, no end user program.
** No <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/pkgreport.cgi?src=libxml-perl|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>

 0. ''Dependencies:''
